item.title: Jim Carrey nearly quit ‘Grinch’ and offered to return his $20 million paycheck. Then the founder of SEAL Team Six came to the rescue
item.description: "Jim started having panic attacks. I would see him lying down on the floor in between setups with a brown paper bag."

item.title: Sam Altman should take Niklas Östberg’s number—what the Delivery Hero founder doesn’t know about going public and shareholders isn’t worth knowing
item.description: A founder-CEO who rode out shareholder backlash, Niklas Östberg’s journey at Delivery Hero shows how long-term conviction can survive—and even thrive—...

item.title: Your Super Bowl party can beat inflation, Wells Fargo says. Just double down on wings and guac and skip the beef
item.description: "If you can't get excited about a big plate of chicken wings and cheesy nachos with guacamole, I don't know what's going to make you happy."

item.title: How e.l.f. Beauty has used Super Bowl ads to rocket from 10% brand awareness to 40%
item.description: CFO Mandy Fields discusses the strategy finance and marketing use to help the brand reach new shoppers.

item.title: Moltbook is the talk of Silicon Valley. But the furor is eerily reminiscent of a 2017 Facebook research experiment
item.description: As Fortune’s Jeremy Kahn points out, we’ve seen this film before.
